message: Remember our regular monthly meeting is tomorrow: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=143895032340125
Who is giving a talk tonight? I'd be happy to talk about OAuth.
I've integrated with Facebook Connect OAuth and I'm currently banging my head against Windows Connect OAuth if you want some code samples.
@eddroid post what you've got. I'll have a look at it.
When I walked in there was a page on Erlang programming in Ruby.  What was that?
btw. scratch what I said last night about Heroscale. Spoke to our opps guy who has just disabled them.
That's http://reia-lang.org/ , which is a Ruby-like language implemented in Erlang.
http://hackmiami.org/2011/02/18/welcome-claudio-as-the-new-education-czar-of-hackmaimi/ "currently are looking for people to give primers on Python, Ruby on Rails, and PHP"
I'm pushing to get you guys a monthly spot in the new offices of PrisaDigital on Biscayne and 47th.  When do you need to know for the next meeting?
Next meeting is March 21, so by March 14.
